body: Abraham, Thanks for finding the bug with the basePoint.  I fixed it in the attached GH file. I am not sure if I understand your comments about the text location for multiple bars.  This is what it should look like: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/vOQMXCMD51*IkrG8ij50Wb-ew5-EWgdQxoAhGpWshoOOnUzcH4t9ix5ueHsZhPG-GDWWz*tim*wW57-ay3L462DqAs9-6U8F/ChartWithLabels.PNG) The attached GH file shows you how to navigate the data tree structure to ensure it displays like this. -Chris
